_scf_metadata.description: SCF Framework - Core code and spoke templates for AI context persistence

identity.name: Session Continuity Framework (SCF)
identity.one_liner: AI-agnostic context persistence for any knowledge work
identity.success_looks_like: Any AI assistant can pick up any project with full context, and learnings flow across projects automatically

constraints: AI-agnostic: Must work with Claude, GPT, Copilot, Gemini, etc.
Environment-agnostic: No lock-in to specific tools
Non-coding support: Works for research, writing, design - not just code

approach.workflow: Dogfooding - SCF tracks its own development
approach.review_process: AI proposes, human approves direction changes

philosophy.core_principle: AI as responsible partner, not just enabler
behaviors: Detect scope drift and flag before enabling
Require explicit acknowledgment for direction changes
Prefer 'are you sure?' over silent compliance

evolution_log.change: Established project foundation - separated framework from hub
evolution_log.rationale: Framework is the brains, hub is user's personal storage. Clear separation enables adoption without inheriting creator's context.

decisions.rationale: This repo contains only framework code and spoke templates. Hub (user's personal data, learnings, project registry) lives separately at user-chosen location. Extensions live in separate repos.

decisions.decision: Project Foundation system inspired by Conductor
decisions.rationale: Learned from Google's Conductor: guided setup extracts project identity, boundaries, approach. SCF adds drift detection and evolution logging for intentional development.
AI should reign in vibe coding when it strays too far. Detect drift, require explicit acknowledgment for direction changes. Enable but remain intentful.

decisions.decision: Hub-Spoke architecture with local spoke signals
decisions.rationale: Spokes signal locally (append-only JSONL), hub pulls on demand. Prevents spokes from needing write access to hub.
Only share learnings with impact >= 8 to prevent signal noise

next_steps: Update scf CLI with 'hub create' command for guided hub setup
Move .scf-registry/ contents to user's hub location
Move extensions to separate repos (scf-vscode-extension, scf-browser-extension)
Add drift detection logic to SCF_README.md template
Implement incomplete foundation detection in teach.py
Create non-coding project templates (research, writing, design)
